uvi.description:
scsi: iscsi: Fix conn use after free during resets

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.52 by commit 89812e7957ab0746eab66ed6fc49d52bb4dca250. For more details please see the references link.
